projects.title: MindCare: AI-powered Mental Health Platform
projects.description: â€¢ Engineered an AI-driven mental wellness assistant for youth, integrating Gemini AI, crisis detection, and gamifiedtracking, expected to improve engagement by âˆ¼30%. .â€¢ Built an immersive chat system with a React.js + VRM avatar frontend and a Node.js/Express + PostgreSQL backendfor reliable, low-latency performance.â€¢ Leveraged GCP (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL) for secure data management, and ensuring scalability and performance.

projects.title: MailWise: AI-Powered Email Management System

Optimized backend components (Node.js/PostgreSQL) to achieve >3Ã— speedup in data processing.

projects.title: CrowdScope: AI-powered Market Insights Platform
projects.description: â€¢ Built a solution that analyzes community discussions (Reddit) to extract real-time market/consumer insights using Gemini AI and Python â€” reducing manual research by âˆ¼70%.â€¢ Developed scalable backend with Node.js/Python for optimized data retrieval/analysis.â€¢ Delivered business-oriented reports through an intuitive React UI, useful for market analysis and client decision-making.
